parameters.name: AcceleratorId
parameters.description: The ID of the GA instance.

parameters.name: ClientToken
parameters.description:
The client token that is used to ensure the idempotence of the request.

You can use the client to generate the token, but you must make sure that the token is unique among different requests. The token can contain only ASCII characters.

>  If you do not specify this parameter, the system automatically uses the **request ID** as the **client token**. The **request ID** may be different for each request.

parameters.name: Description
parameters.description:
The description of the endpoint group.

The description can be up to 200 characters in length and cannot start with `http://` or `https://`.

parameters.name: DryRun
parameters.description:
Specifies whether to perform a dry run, without sending the actual request. Valid values:

*   **true**: performs only a dry run. The system checks the request for potential issues, including missing parameter values, incorrect request syntax, and service limits. If the request fails the dry run, an error code is returned. If the request passes the dry run, a 2xx HTTP status code is returned.
*   **false** (default): performs a dry run and performs the actual request. If the request passes the dry run, a 2xx HTTP status code is returned and the operation is performed.

parameters.name: EndpointConfigurations
parameters.description: The configurations of the endpoints in the endpoint group.

parameters.name: EndpointGroupRegion
parameters.description: The ID of the region in which to create the endpoint group.

parameters.name: EndpointGroupType
parameters.description:
The type of the endpoint group. Valid values:

*   **default** (default): a default endpoint group.
*   **virtual**: a virtual endpoint group.

>  When you call this operation to create a virtual endpoint group for a Layer 4 listener, make sure that a default endpoint group is created.

parameters.name: EndpointProtocolVersion
parameters.description:
The backend service protocol. Valid values:

*   **HTTP1.1** (default)
*   **HTTP2**

>  This parameter is required only when you set the EndpointRequestProtocol parameter to HTTPS.

parameters.name: EndpointRequestProtocol
parameters.description:
The protocol that is used by the backend service. Default value: HTTP. Valid values:

*   **HTTP**
*   **HTTPS**

> *   You can set this parameter only when the listener that is associated with the endpoint group uses **HTTP** or **HTTPS**.
>*   For an **HTTP** listener, the backend service protocol must be **HTTP**.

parameters.name: HealthCheckEnabled
parameters.description:
Specifies whether to enable the health check feature. Valid values:

*   **true**
*   **false**

parameters.name: HealthCheckIntervalSeconds
parameters.description: The interval at which health checks are performed. Unit: seconds.

parameters.name: HealthCheckPath
parameters.description: The path to which to send health check requests.

parameters.name: HealthCheckPort
parameters.description: The port that is used for health checks.

parameters.name: HealthCheckProtocol
parameters.description:
The protocol over which to send health check requests. Valid values:

*   **tcp** or **TCP**
*   **http** or **HTTP**
*   **https** or **HTTPS**

parameters.name: ListenerId
parameters.description: The ID of the listener.

parameters.name: Name
parameters.description:
The name of the endpoint group.

The name must be 1 to 128 characters in length and can contain letters, digits, periods (.), underscores (\_), and hyphens (-). The name must start with a letter.

parameters.name: PortOverrides
parameters.description: The port mappings.

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description: The ID of the region where the GA instance is deployed. Set the value to **cn-hangzhou**.

parameters.name: Tag
parameters.description: Tags of GA instances.

parameters.name: ThresholdCount
parameters.description:
The number of consecutive health check failures that must occur before a healthy endpoint group is considered unhealthy, or the number of consecutive health check successes that must occur before an unhealthy endpoint group is considered healthy.

Valid values: **2** to **10**. Default value: **3**.

parameters.name: TrafficPercentage
parameters.description:
The traffic ratio for the endpoint group when the specified listener is associated with multiple endpoint groups.

Valid values: **1** to **100**.
